ingredients: +   1/2 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons cornstarch,   +   1/4 cup cold water,   +   1/4 cup orange juice, 1 pound Bing or other dark, sweet cherries, rinsed and pitted (or use frozen pitted cherries),   +   1/2 teaspoon finely grated orange zest, 3 cups vanilla bean ice cream,   +   1/4 teaspoon cherry extract,   +   1/4 cup brandy
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Cholesterol 29mg 10%, Sodium 54mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 18%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 42g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 11mg 56%, Calcium 98mg 8%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 323mg 7%
